content:
You're a hockey fan too! Unfortunately, I have to break the news to you that the 2022 Stanley Cup Playoffs have already concluded. The Colorado Avalanche won the Stanley Cup by defeating the Tampa Bay Lightning in the Stanley Cup Finals, 4-2.

However, I can still provide you with some context and highlights from the Lightning's 2022 playoff run!

The Tampa Bay Lightning had an impressive postseason, making it to the Stanley Cup Finals for the third consecutive year. They finished the 2021-2022 regular season with a 51-23-8 record, earning the third seed in the Atlantic Division.

Notable player performances during the playoffs included:

1. Nikita Kucherov: Led the team in scoring with 27 points (8 goals, 19 assists) in 23 playoff games.
2. Victor Hedman: Had a strong postseason, recording 21 points (6 goals, 15 assists) in 23 games.
3. Andrei Vasilevskiy: Despite the team's loss in the Finals, Vasilevskiy had an incredible playoff run, posting a 14-9 record with a .918 save percentage and 2.50 goals-against average.

The Lightning will look to regroup and make another deep playoff run in the 2022-2023 season. Keep an eye on their progress, and I'm sure they'll be a strong contender again.

If you have any other questions about the NHL or the Lightning, feel free to ask!
